message.content:
cs.CR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.SI 

This paper is about improving the performance of intrusion detection systems, which falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR). The paper proposes a hybrid feature selection method using machine learning techniques, which involves selecting relevant features and reducing the number of features to improve the accuracy and learning time. This involves using correlation-based feature selection and information gain, which are techniques commonly used in machine learning (cs.LG). The paper also applies adaptive boosting using naive Bayes as the weak classifier, which is a popular machine learning algorithm (cs.AI). The use of machine learning algorithms to improve intrusion detection systems also falls under the category of neural networks (cs.NE) and intelligent systems (cs.SI).
